section.label: New Site
section.p: Welcome to the new Preware.org site. It is still under construction. We will hopefully be integrating a new feed search feature soon. Before it is available, you can browse the package feeds manually.

section.label: Introduction
section.p: Preware is a package management application for the Palm Pre. Users can install any package from any of the open standard package feeds on preware.org (or any other location that hosts an open standard package feed).
Preware is the most advanced installer currently available - it is the only on-device installer that can install applications, themes, and patches, as well as give access to over 1600 Linux programs.

section.label: Need Help or Want to Help Out?
section.p: You can chat with the developers on the Freenode IRC network.
